min_content_terms.description: Minimum number of terms that must exist in clean content of each web page in order to be stored.

min_unique_content_terms.description: Minimum unique terms that must exist in clean content

max_depth.description: Maximum depth to crawl before abandoning a specific path. Depth is increased every time a link is extracted from a non-relevant web page.

fetch_buffer_size.description: Max number of urls to fetch per run

max_retry_count.description: Max number of attempts to fetch a Web page before giving up

min_response_rate.description: Min bytes-per-seconds for fetching a web page

max_content_size.description: Max content size (bytes) for downloading a web page

max_requests_per_run.description: Max fetch set size per run (Sets are made by URLs from the same host)

max_requests_per_host_per_run.description: Max URLs from a specific host per run

max_connections_per_host.description: Max number of fetching threads for each host

max_fetched_per_host.description: Max web pages to fetch per host

request_timeout.description: Max time to wait for Fetcher to get all URLs in a run
